Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.Screens

Class LevelScreen

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.Screens.LevelScreen
public class LevelScreen extends Object
LevelScreen class manages UI elements and interactions across game levels.

  • Constructor Details

    • LevelScreen

      public LevelScreen(javafx.scene.Group root, int heartsToDisplay, ComponentsFactory componentsFactory, double screenWidth, javafx.scene.Group uiLayer)
      Constructs new LevelScreen instance.
      Parameters:
      root - : root group where level screen elements will be added.
      heartsToDisplay - : number of hearts to display at the start of game.
      componentsFactory - : ComponentsFactory used for components creation.
      screenWidth - : width of screen.
      uiLayer - : the group representing UI layer.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if UI Layer is null.

  • Method Details

    • showHeartDisplay

      public void showHeartDisplay()
      Adds heart display to root group.

    • removeHearts

      public void removeHearts(int heartsRemaining)
      Removes hearts from display based on remaining hearts.
      Parameters:
      heartsRemaining - : number of hearts remaining to be displayed.

    • addHitboxesToScene

      public void addHitboxesToScene(javafx.scene.Group root, ActiveActor... actors)
      Adds hitbox of given actors to root group.
      Parameters:
      root - : root group where hitboxes will be added.
      actors - : actors whose hitbox need to be added.

    • removeHitboxesFromScene

      public void removeHitboxesFromScene(ActiveActor... actors)
      Removes hitbox of given actors from root group.
      Parameters:
      actors - : actors whose hitbox need to be removed.

    • updateKillCount

      public void updateKillCount(int currentKills, int killTarget)
      Updates kill count text based on player's current kills and target kills.
      Parameters:
      currentKills - : player's current number of kills.
      killTarget - : target number of kills to reach.

    • positionKillCountText

      private void positionKillCountText()
      Positions kill count text on screen.

    • showKillCountText

      public void showKillCountText()
      Adds kill count text to UI layer if it's not already present.

    • showInstructions

      public void showInstructions()
      Displays instructions on screen with fade in and fade out effects.

    • createInstructionText

      private javafx.scene.text.Text createInstructionText(String text, double x, double y)
      Creates new instruction text with given content and position.
      Parameters:
      text - : text content of instruction.
      x - : x-coordinate of text.
      y - : y-coordinate of text.
      Returns:
      created Text object.

    • applyFadeTransition

      private void applyFadeTransition(javafx.scene.text.Text text)
      Applies fade in and fade out transition to given text.
      Parameters:
      text - : text to which the transition will be applied.
